ucdxml:block:
code-point-attributes &= attribute CI { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute Cased { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWCF { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWCM { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWL { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWKCF { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWT { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute CWU { boolean }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute NFKC_CF { "#" | zero-or-more-code-points }?
code-point-attributes &= attribute NFKC_SCF { "#" | zero-or-more-code-points }?
